transcript:
Hello?
Hello? Good afternoon. I am saying that if someone is available from the system, then please connect me with them. Because like this, sir, I am also not understanding a little bit on the call and how to send you a screenshot.
So, like those who are searching in your company, I just need a little bit of the product's name and how they are searching, plus I will tell them how our listing is coming, where it is not coming.
If I see that thing, then I will be able to do screen recording or screenshot.
Your way is different. Your way is different, we have to do it. We have just sent the screenshot video, right?
It is not to search in my way, sir. I am saying the same thing, if I am on video with them.
How will I know how they are searching? You will say that I will take it like this. That's how it is. No, no, I will not say like that. I am trying to explain to you. If I raise an issue in the team, in the back end, then I will have to screen record and send it to them. I have sent the video, right? I have sent the video, see. I have sent the video.
Yes sir, it has been sent, but if you come online once, then you send it to them from whom you were getting the search done, I will connect with them and do it.
Okay, okay, okay. It's a little important, that's why I'm requesting you.
Okay. You give me the number, tell me the number, I will not call you, I will call them directly.
No, no, I will do it. I will come online to you now.
Ha ha, sure sir, sure. Please call me as soon as you come online.
Yes, yes.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to connect with someone from the system.

- Needs help with product listing visibility.

- Wants to understand how products are searched.



Resolution:

- Executive said he would come online.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer after coming online.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- product listing, search, screen recording
